1619550.name: Shank the Cop
1619550.description:
Cops have to decide who is a threat and who is not. Decide who is your opponent and shoot them down, or play as the criminal and shank the cop!

Before the game begins decide who will play as a cop, and who will be a criminal. The cops must shoot the criminals, but if they shoot a civilian they will be terminated.

This is a multiplayer only game where you compete against your friends! Shoot or shank your way to victory!

For the best experience, plug in an Xbox controller. If you don't have one, the game will revert to keyboard controls. You must have one controller for each player in order to enjoy local multiplayer. Keyboard controls can only be used when playing online.
